text: Richard Paul Ebstein (born February 19, 1943) is an American behavioral geneticist. He is Professor in the Department of Psychology at the National University of Singapore, as well as Professor Emeritus in the Psychology Department at Hebrew University. He is known for his research on the genetics of human social behaviors, such as political ideology, novelty seeking, and dancing. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:1943 births Category:American geneticists Category:Behavior geneticists Category:National University of Singapore faculty Category:Human geneticists Category:Union College (New York) alumni Category:Yale University alumni Category:Hebrew University of Jerusalem faculty
